description: Kontigo Care AB engages in the development of mobile health solutions for addiction treatment. The company is headquartered in Uppsala, Uppsala and currently employs 10 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2015-06-23. The firm operates as a provider of mobile solutions for the treatment of alcoholism. The firm develops TripleA which is a system of care for the treatment of alcoholism. The system consists of a wireless breathalyzer, an application and a health care portal. The portal creates patient care plan and shares it with health care provider. On the basis of this plan, the patient receives information about scheduled sobriety test. Test results are then sent back to the health care provider who can monitor the patient's sobriety every day. The firm operates domestically on the territory of Sweden.
naics: Navigational, Measuring, Electromedical, and Control Instruments Manufacturing
name: Kontigo Care AB
